definition: to write/to do the actual writing
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: His book The End of Sparta will appear in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 他执笔的《斯巴达的末日》一书将于2011年出版。

sentences.english: What happened to you when you first set words to paper?
sentences.chinese: 当你第一次执笔写作时你发生什么了？

sentences.english: With ginkgo leaves flying in the autumn sky , Principal wrote words on a piece.
sentences.chinese: 秋日银杏叶满天，校长执笔树下签。

sentences.english: The president of a university is the first author of the text hook.
sentences.chinese: 大学校长是那部教科书的第一执笔人。

sentences.english: And that John was written by the disciple of John.
sentences.chinese: 还有约翰福音是由约翰的信徒执笔。

sentences.english: Who will be writing, driving and managing your social media content?
sentences.chinese: 谁将执笔，主导和管理你的社交媒体内容？

sentences.english: The article was discussed by us all, but Comrade Wang did the actual writing.
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章是集体讨论，王同志执笔的。

sentences.english: The president of a university is the first author of the text book.
sentences.chinese: 大学校长是那部教科书的第一执笔人。

sentences.english: An agreement does not need to be notarized or written up by a lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 协议是不需要有人做公证的，也不需要由律师来执笔。

sentences.english: Basically, one should use five fingers to hold a Chinese writing brush and keep the shaft upright.
sentences.chinese: 拿中国毛笔的方法一般是五指执笔法，笔杆要竖直。

sentences.english: The copyright holder may pay appropriate remunerations to the writers.
sentences.chinese: 著作权人可以支付执笔人适当的报酬。

sentences.english: Write your mission statement as if it will never change.
sentences.chinese: 执笔撰写使命宣言时当它是永恒不变的。

sentences.english: Do you or any of your co-authors have any conflict of interest?
sentences.chinese: 您是否或你的任一个共同执笔者有任何利益冲突？

sentences.english: Below is a reflection of the service by Brother Chunming Lin.
sentences.chinese: 以下是林春明弟兄执笔的回想。

sentences.english: The technique of writing includes two aspects of holding and wielding brush writings.
sentences.chinese: 笔法包括执笔和运笔两个方面。

sentences.english: The lamp's gone out, and I'm writing in the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 油尽灯枯了，我现在执笔时已经漆黑一片。

definition: to take up one's pen/to start to write
to put pen to paper/pen mark
nib/pen point/the tip of a writing brush or pencil
to write or draw with a brush/to put pen to paper/to write
to write freely/to express oneself as one pleases
to write on behalf of sb/to ghostwrite
